trans-unit.source: Azure API Management Policy Reference
trans-unit.target: Azure API Management Policy Reference

trans-unit.source: Learn about the policies available to configure API Management.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the policies available to configure API Management.

trans-unit.source: Azure API Management Policy Reference
trans-unit.target: Azure API Management Policy Reference

trans-unit.source: This section provides an index for the policies in the [API Management policy reference][].
trans-unit.target: This section provides an index for the policies in the [API Management policy reference][].

trans-unit.source: For information on adding and configuring policies, see [Policies in API Management][].
trans-unit.target: For information on adding and configuring policies, see [Policies in API Management][].

trans-unit.source: Policy expressions can be used as attribute values or text values in any of the API Management policies, unless the policy specifies otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Policy expressions can be used as attribute values or text values in any of the API Management policies, unless the policy specifies otherwise.

trans-unit.source: Some policies such as the [Control flow][] and [Set variable][] policies are based on policy expressions.
trans-unit.target: Some policies such as the [Control flow][] and [Set variable][] policies are based on policy expressions.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Advanced policies][] and [Policy expressions][]
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Advanced policies][] and [Policy expressions][]

trans-unit.source: Policy reference index
trans-unit.target: Policy reference index

trans-unit.source: Access restriction policies
trans-unit.target: Access restriction policies

trans-unit.source: [Check HTTP header][] - Enforces existence and/or value of a HTTP Header.
trans-unit.target: [Check HTTP header][] - Enforces existence and/or value of a HTTP Header.

trans-unit.source: [Limit call rate][] - Prevents API usage spikes by limiting calls and/or the bandwidth consumption rate.
trans-unit.target: [Limit call rate][] - Prevents API usage spikes by limiting calls and/or the bandwidth consumption rate.

trans-unit.source: [Restrict caller IPs][] - Filters (allows/denies) calls from specific IP addresses and/or address ranges.
trans-unit.target: [Restrict caller IPs][] - Filters (allows/denies) calls from specific IP addresses and/or address ranges.

trans-unit.source: [Set usage quota][] - Allows you to enforce a renewable or lifetime call volume and/or bandwidth quota.
trans-unit.target: [Set usage quota][] - Allows you to enforce a renewable or lifetime call volume and/or bandwidth quota.

trans-unit.source: [Validate JWT][] - Enforces existence and validity of a JWT extracted from either a specified HTTP Header or a specified query parameter.
trans-unit.target: [Validate JWT][] - Enforces existence and validity of a JWT extracted from either a specified HTTP Header or a specified query parameter.

trans-unit.source: Advanced policies
trans-unit.target: Advanced policies

trans-unit.source: [Control flow][] - Conditionally applies policy statements based on the results of the evaluation of Boolean [expressions][].
trans-unit.target: [Control flow][] - Conditionally applies policy statements based on the results of the evaluation of Boolean [expressions][].

trans-unit.source: [Set variable][] - Persist a value in a named [context][] variable for later access.
trans-unit.target: [Set variable][] - Persist a value in a named [context][] variable for later access.

trans-unit.source: Authentication policies
trans-unit.target: Authentication policies

trans-unit.source: [Authenticate with Basic][] - Authenticate with a backend service using Basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: [Authenticate with Basic][] - Authenticate with a backend service using Basic authentication.

trans-unit.source: [Authenticate with client certificate][] - Authenticate with a backend service using client certificates.
trans-unit.target: [Authenticate with client certificate][] - Authenticate with a backend service using client certificates.

trans-unit.source: Caching policies
trans-unit.target: Caching policies

trans-unit.source: [Get from cache][] - Perform cache look up and return a valid cached response when available.
trans-unit.target: [Get from cache][] - Perform cache look up and return a valid cached response when available.

trans-unit.source: [Store to cache][] - Caches response according to the specified cache control configuration.
trans-unit.target: [Store to cache][] - Caches response according to the specified cache control configuration.

trans-unit.source: Cross domain policies
trans-unit.target: Cross domain policies

trans-unit.source: [Allow cross-domain calls][] - Makes the API accessible from Adobe Flash and Microsoft Silverlight browser-based clients.
trans-unit.target: [Allow cross-domain calls][] - Makes the API accessible from Adobe Flash and Microsoft Silverlight browser-based clients.

trans-unit.source: [CORS][] - Adds cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from browser-based clients.
trans-unit.target: [CORS][] - Adds cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from browser-based clients.

trans-unit.source: [JSONP][] - Adds JSON with padding (JSONP) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from JavaScript browser-based clients.
trans-unit.target: [JSONP][] - Adds JSON with padding (JSONP) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from JavaScript browser-based clients.

trans-unit.source: Transformation policies
trans-unit.target: Transformation policies

trans-unit.source: [Convert JSON to XML][] - Converts request or response body from JSON to XML.
trans-unit.target: [Convert JSON to XML][] - Converts request or response body from JSON to XML.

trans-unit.source: [Convert XML to JSON][] - Converts request or response body from XML to JSON.
trans-unit.target: [Convert XML to JSON][] - Converts request or response body from XML to JSON.

trans-unit.source: [Find and replace string in body][] - Finds a request or response substring and replaces it with a different substring.
trans-unit.target: [Find and replace string in body][] - Finds a request or response substring and replaces it with a different substring.

trans-unit.source: [Mask URLs in content][] - Re-writes (masks) links in the response body and in the location header so that they point to the equivalent link via the proxy.
trans-unit.target: [Mask URLs in content][] - Re-writes (masks) links in the response body and in the location header so that they point to the equivalent link via the proxy.

trans-unit.source: [Set backend service][] - Changes the backend service for an incoming request.
trans-unit.target: [Set backend service][] - Changes the backend service for an incoming request.

trans-unit.source: [Set body][] - Sets the message body for incoming and outgoing requests.
trans-unit.target: [Set body][] - Sets the message body for incoming and outgoing requests.

trans-unit.source: [Set HTTP header][] - Assigns a value to an existing response and/or request header or adds a new response and/or request header.
trans-unit.target: [Set HTTP header][] - Assigns a value to an existing response and/or request header or adds a new response and/or request header.

trans-unit.source: [Set query string parameter][] - Adds, replaces value of, or deletes request query string parameter.
trans-unit.target: [Set query string parameter][] - Adds, replaces value of, or deletes request query string parameter.

trans-unit.source: [Rewrite URL][] - Converts a request URL from its public form to the form expected by the web service.
trans-unit.target: [Rewrite URL][] - Converts a request URL from its public form to the form expected by the web service.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.target: For more information on policy expressions, see the following video.

trans-unit.target: test
